channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flying tipping on Oglander Road (corner of Muschamp), 14th October
item.description:
There is a pile of rubbish on Oglander Road where it meets Muschamp. It would be great if this eyesore could be removed. Thank You.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Muschamp Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Report of crew behaviour, 14th October
item.description:
On collection day, the crew accidentally tipped the bin over, they picked it back up however they did not clear all of the rubbish that fell out of it. The floor is now a mess - neither did they place the bin in its correct spot. Please have this resolved
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilmer Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights nit easily seen, 14th October
item.description:
Lights are out of position not easily seen. Cars drive straight through red lights almost hitting pedestrians who have the green man.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheapside, City of London

item.title: Mice activity, 14th October
item.description:
Noticeable increase in mice activity around 32 Ebury Street. In the 13 years that we have been based here, this has never previously been an issue. However, in recent weeks, several residents have observed mice/rodent activity in and around the street. We would be grateful if this matter could be investigated, as matter of urgency, and if appropriate, pest controls measures could be taken to address and prevent further infestations. Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grosvenor Gardens Mews North, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter around bench and extending into woodlanf, 14th October
item.description:
I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. ///linked.herbs.tunes https://w3w.co/linked.herbs.tunes Lots of litter around bench, much of it extending into woodland and undergrowth behind and around bench. Please can you attend ASAP and clear area as currently looks unsightly and neglected. W3W location supplied above to assist in you finding correct location. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Farm Road, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
